comments:
Description: Error message pops up when using data source defined in library to create a data set in report design.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a data source "ds1" and data set "dset1" in library "library1".
2. Create a report design, add a data source "ds2".
3. Select "library1.ds1" data source to create a data set in report design.
4. Error message pops up.
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
